oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Abraham Lincoln signature
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Postage Stamp Album given to Jimmy (James Flournoy Van Deventer) by Mama, Christmas, 1869. Inside cover contains glued in note and signature of United States President A. Lincoln, Oct. 29, 1864, and English novelist W.M. Thackeray, Buffalo, Dec.(?), 29, 1855. All stamps were removed from the album before it was donated. From the Van Deventer Collection, folder 84-3.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Autographs; Presidents; Authors;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
